Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Authorizes a residential parking system in the village of Sleepy Hollow in the county of Westchester
Summary: Authorizes a residential parking system in the village of Sleepy Hollow in the county of Westchester.
LawCode: Add ยง1640-t, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to a residential parking system in the village of Sleepy Hollow in the county of Westchester
